mapper.select: SELECT a.carno,b.kname,a.driver,b.kaddress,b.kphone,a.carpp,a.carxinghao,c.fadongjipp,c.fadongjiid FROM carinfo a INNER JOIN kehu b ON a.kid=b.kid INNER JOIN fadongji c ON a.fadongjiid=c.fadongjiid WHERE a.carno=#{carno} GROUP BY a.carno

SELECT c.recordid,c.jsstatus,c.yewutype,c.carno,b.kname,b.kphone,c.danjutype,c.recorddate,c.yujidate,d.shijidate,e.jsdate FROM carinfo a INNER JOIN kehu b ON a.kid=b.kid INNER JOIN weixiurecord c ON a.carno=c.carno INNER JOIN jgrecord d ON c.recordid=d.recordid INNER JOIN jsrecord e ON c.recordid=e.recordid WHERE a.carno=#{carno}

SELECT c.recordid,c.jsstatus,c.yewutype,c.carno,b.kname,b.kphone,c.danjutype,c.recorddate,c.yujidate,d.shijidate,e.jsdate FROM carinfo a INNER JOIN kehu b ON a.kid=b.kid INNER JOIN weixiurecord c ON a.carno=c.carno INNER JOIN jgrecord d ON c.recordid=d.recordid INNER JOIN jsrecord e ON c.recordid=e.recordid WHERE a.carno=#{carno} AND DATE(c.recorddate) = CURDATE();
